sections.name: [AGENT-USE] Docs & Guides Instructions (UNC Notes Repo)
sections.content:
> **Identity Directive:** Refer to Joe Waller as `joediggidyyy` and refer to GitHub Copilot as `ORACL` or `ORACL-Prime` in every interaction.

Version: 1.0
Last Updated: 2026-01-14

The `docs/` tree contains reader-facing help for this repository (how to view notes, dashboards, quick starts).

sections.name: Editing rules
sections.content:
- Keep docs consistent with the actual workflow: `python maintain.py` and `python maintain.py --strict`.
- Avoid adding or embedding sensitive content (PII) or prohibited course materials.
- Prefer small diffs; keep navigation files (`notes/INDEX.md`) generated by tooling.

sections.name: Machine-readable sidecar policy (.md + .json)
sections.content:
- This file has a sibling `docs/guides/AGENT_INSTRUCTIONS.json` that must remain in sync.
- `checksum` in the JSON is SHA-256 of this Markdown (CRLF normalized to LF).
